resources.string: LavSeeker shows lavatories for your locations.
You can choose your own locations and get lavatories in their vicinity. Clicking on a lavatory shows the lavatory in a map application.
The sourcecode of this app is available at GitHub. For further explanations have a look at the About Page.

Connecting to the Network: This permission is needed because data is retrieved by making requests to servers on the Internet. Without this permission, no price information can be received. Optional: authorization for GPS.

This application is derived from Privacy Friendly Weather, developed by the research group SECUSO. Source code licensed under GPLv3. The app uses icons from Google Material Design Icons licensed under Apache License Version 2.0, Android Volley which is licensed under Apache License Version 2.0, AndroidX libraries which is licensed under Apache License Version 2.0, AutoSuggestTextViewAPICall which is licensed under Apache License Version 2.0, osmdroid which is licensed under Apache License Version 2.0, and AndroidAddressFormatter which is licensed under MIT License
More information can be found on:
No location was found that matches your input. It is recommended to select one of the items from the dropdown list.
The retrieved data was not well-formed.
Your Device is not connected to the Internet
Error retrieving data, please try again!
There is no city selected. To select a city go to \"Manage locations\".
No city found. Increase search radius
LavSeeker only uses the permission \"Internet\" to retrieve price data. It further does not include any tracking mechanisms or advertisement.
Where does the information come from?
Allow usage of current GPS position in first TAB and in the widget. Position update is triggered automatically by widget.
